name: terraagent
description: Transform scientific Python packages into interactive Streamlit web applications with rich visualizations, maps, and uncertainty quantification.
author: TerraAgent Team

commands.name: integrate-package
commands.description: Integrate a scientific Python package from GitHub into TerraAgent
commands.usage: Integrate the {package_name} package from {github_url} for {domain} analysis

commands.name: generate-app
commands.description: Generate a Streamlit app from a science module
commands.usage: Generate a Streamlit app for src/science_{domain}.py

commands.name: create-module
commands.description: Create a new science wrapper module following TerraAgent patterns
commands.usage: Create a science module for {domain} analysis using {package_name}
